events.name: U.S. Decision to Send Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
events.wd_label: U.S. Decision to Send Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The United States has decided to send cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, despite the weapons being banned by 100 countries, including U.S. allies.
events.description: The United States has decided to send cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, despite the weapons being banned by 100 countries, including U.S. allies.

events.name: Approval by President Joe Biden
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden approved the transfer of cluster munitions to Ukraine after months of debates.
events.description: President Joe Biden approved the transfer of cluster munitions to Ukraine after months of debates.

events.name: Military Aid Package Details
events.wd_description: The cluster munitions will be compatible with the 155 mm howitzers previously provided by the United States, which have been instrumental in Ukraine's efforts to reclaim territory.
events.description: The cluster munitions will be compatible with the 155 mm howitzers previously provided by the United States, which have been instrumental in Ukraine's efforts to reclaim territory.

events.name: Assurances from Ukraine
events.wd_description: Ukraine has assured the United States that the cluster munitions will not be used in urban areas populated by civilians.
events.description: Ukraine has assured the United States that the cluster munitions will not be used in urban areas populated by civilians.

events.name: U.S. to Supply Ukraine with Advanced Long-Range Missiles
events.wd_label: U.S. to Supply Ukraine with Advanced Long-Range Missiles
events.wd_description: The United States plans to supply Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles, including ATACMS, to assist Kyiv in its ongoing counter-offensive against Russian forces.
events.description: The United States plans to supply Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles, including ATACMS, to assist Kyiv in its ongoing counter-offensive against Russian forces.

events.name: Announcement by President Joe Biden
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden announced plans to provide Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles after meeting with Ukrainian officials at the White House.
events.description: President Joe Biden announced plans to provide Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles after meeting with Ukrainian officials at the White House.

events.name: Details of the ATACMS Missiles
events.wd_description: Ukraine will receive ATACMS missiles, which have a range of up to 190 miles (300km), enabling them to hit Russian targets deep behind the front line.
events.description: Ukraine will receive ATACMS missiles, which have a range of up to 190 miles (300km), enabling them to hit Russian targets deep behind the front line.

events.name: Recent Ukrainian Missile Strikes
events.wd_description: On Friday, two of Ukraine’s missiles struck Russia’s Black Sea fleet headquarters using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain and France.
events.description: On Friday, two of Ukraine’s missiles struck Russia’s Black Sea fleet headquarters using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain and France.

events.name: New Military Aid Package
events.wd_description: Ukraine will receive a new tranche of $325 million in military aid, including artillery and ammunition, as part of the support announced by President Biden.
events.description: Ukraine will receive a new tranche of $325 million in military aid, including artillery and ammunition, as part of the support announced by President Biden.

events.name: Russian Missile Strike in Chernihiv, Ukraine
events.wd_label: Russian Missile Strike in Chernihiv, Ukraine
events.wd_description: A Russian missile strike in Chernihiv, Ukraine, has killed at least seven people, including a six-year-old girl, and injured nearly 130 others. The strike hit a university and a theater where a drone manufacturing event was taking place.
events.description: A Russian missile strike in Chernihiv, Ukraine, has killed at least seven people, including a six-year-old girl, and injured nearly 130 others. The strike hit a university and a theater where a drone manufacturing event was taking place.

events.name: Casualties and Injuries
events.wd_description: The missile strike resulted in the deaths of at least seven people, including a six-year-old girl, and injured close to 130 others.
events.description: The missile strike resulted in the deaths of at least seven people, including a six-year-old girl, and injured close to 130 others.

events.name: Targets Hit
events.wd_description: The missile struck a university and a theater in Chernihiv, where a drone manufacturing event was being held.
events.description: The missile struck a university and a theater in Chernihiv, where a drone manufacturing event was being held.

events.name: Reactions from Ukrainian Officials
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and acting mayor of Chernihiv Oleksandr Lomako condemned the attack, with Lomako describing it as a war crime against civilians.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and acting mayor of Chernihiv Oleksandr Lomako condemned the attack, with Lomako describing it as a war crime against civilians.

events.name: Event Approval
events.wd_description: The local military-civilian administration had approved the drone manufacturing event and its venue.
events.description: The local military-civilian administration had approved the drone manufacturing event and its venue.
